entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 near Cape Race overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 near Cape Race in the morning. Wind becoming north 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
